title: Boeing Nears 787 Dreamliner Order; Deliveries of the wide-body jets have been on hold for much of the last two years
text:
Nevertheless, the order would boost Boeing's 787 Dreamliner program. Deliveries of the wide-body jets have been on hold for much of the last two years as the plane maker resolves various production issues with U.S. air-safety regulators. Boeing commercial airplanes chief Stan Deal said earlier this weekthe company was "very close" to resuming deliveries.

More to follow.

Write to Andrew Tangel at Andrew.Tangel@wsj.com

Boeing Nears 787 Dreamliner Order
